title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Identify and execute the most effective way to realise the requirements of the nonprofit client
Design, implement, and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices to support various applications, ensuring high performance, security, and scalability
Collaborate on database design and optimisation, including schema design and query performance tuning, to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval
Integrate third-party services and APIs to enhance functionality and provide a seamless experience for end-users
Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies, actively contributing ideas for product enhancements and process improvements

title: Software Developer (iOS)
responsibilities: Leveraged native iOS frameworks and APIs, including Core Data, XCTest, URLSession, and MapKit, to enhance application functionality and user experience
Improved the performance of the application by refactoring and optimising the code-base
Refactored API classes to make use of Combine framework, thereby eliminating some bugs and improving performance
Designed and implemented unit tests using the XCTest framework, ensuring robust and reliable application performance

title: Game Developer
responsibilities: Developed Landmarks game prototype using Unity Game Engine, C#, and MapBox
Established the application framework by integrating MapBox with Unity Game Engine
Coordinated with other developers and concept artists to materialise the prototype

title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Worked as an Associate Software Engineer (ASE)
Developed and maintained SaaS application using Java and React.js
Wrote unit tests and unit testable code to identify and eliminate bugs
Coordinated with co-workers to provide on-time delivery of the product in an agile environment
Worked with Product Owners to refine user stories
